sentence: The non-partisan group previously filed a separate challenge against the Constitutional eligibility of North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn to run in 2022 on the same basis.
title: Good News! On Biden's Economy and Trump's Insurrectionists: 'BradCast' 3/24/2022
